title: Lavender Essential Oil
description: Lavender essential oil is colorless to pale yellow in color. Its aroma is fresh, herbaceous, soft, floral, and bittersweet. The oil can is extremely versatile and can be used for skin care, babies, room aromatics, and much more.
cleaned_text: Lavender is the most versatile of all essential oils, in fact it is considered the universal oil. Non-toxic, non-irritating, it is safe for all skin types and has a nearly endless list of uses and benefits. High altitudes tend to produce higher ester content.Extraction Technique Lavender essential oil is extracted by steam distillation of the fresh, flowering tops of the plant.Information for Aromatherapists Lavender essential oil is a middle note and blends well with most oils, especially citrus and florals as well as these following oils: Cedarwood, Clove, Clary Sage, Pine, Geranium, Vetiver and Patchouli.
